casebody.data:
No. 11-26. Watchtower Bible and Tract Society of New York, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. Antonio M. Segardia de Jesus, Secretary of Justice of Puerto Rico, et al. 565 U.S. 1014, 132 S. Ct. 549,

181 L. Ed. 2d 396,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 7990. November 7, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit denied.

Same case below, 634 F.3d 3.
